h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: The one last trick it has up its sleeve will occur after losing half its health. When it starts to emit a large screeching roar, break off your attack and start running in the opposite direction.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The one last trick it has up its sleeve will occur after losing half its health. When it starts to emit a large screeching roar, break off your attack and start running in the opposite direction.
